title: [Yegharren Valley, Riverbed]
description: Dappled moonlight filters down from above, illuminating patches of lilies-of-the-valley beneath the trees with a ghostly light.  The forest air is still, broken now and then by the song of a nearby bird or the rustling of an animal passing through the underbrush.

Dappled sunlight filters down from above, illuminating patches of lilies-of-the-valley that thrive in the rich soil beneath the trees.  The forest air is still, broken now and then by the song of a nearby bird or the rustling of an animal passing through the underbrush.
